00030 #import "GHNSURL+Utils.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 @implementation NSURL (GHUtils)
00034 
00035 - (NSMutableDictionary *)gh_queryDictionary {
00036   return [NSURL gh_queryStringToDictionary:[self query]];
00037 }
00038 
00039 + (NSString *)gh_dictionaryToQueryString:(NSDictionary *)queryDictionary {
00040   return [self gh_dictionaryToQueryString:queryDictionary sort:NO];
00041 }
00042 
00043 + (NSArray *)gh_dictionaryToQueryArray:(NSDictionary *)queryDictionary sort:(BOOL)sort encoded:(BOOL)encoded {
00044   if (!queryDictionary) return nil;
00045   if ([queryDictionary count] == 0) return [NSArray array];
00046   
00047   NSMutableArray *queryStrings = [NSMutableArray arrayWithCapacity:[queryDictionary count]];
00048   id enumerator = queryDictionary;
00049   if (sort) enumerator = [[queryDictionary allKeys] sortedArrayUsingSelector:@selector(compare:)];
00050   
00051   for(NSString *key in enumerator) {
00052     id value = [queryDictionary valueForKey:key];
00053     NSString *valueDescription = nil;
00054     if ([value isKindOfClass:[NSArray class]]) {
00055       valueDescription = [value componentsJoinedByString:@","];
00056     } else {
00057       valueDescription = [value description];
00058     }
00059     
00060     NSAssert(valueDescription, @"No value description");
00061     
00062     if (encoded) key = [self gh_encodeComponent:key];
00063     if (encoded) valueDescription = [self gh_encodeComponent:valueDescription];
00064     [queryStrings addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@=%@", key, valueDescription]];
00065   }
00066   return queryStrings;
00067 }
00068 
00069 + (NSString *)gh_dictionaryToQueryString:(NSDictionary *)queryDictionary sort:(BOOL)sort {
00070   return [[self gh_dictionaryToQueryArray:queryDictionary sort:sort encoded:YES] componentsJoinedByString:@"&"];
00071 }
00072 
00073 + (NSMutableDictionary *)gh_queryStringToDictionary:(NSString *)string {
00074   NSArray *queryItemStrings = [string componentsSeparatedByString:@"&"];
00075   
00076   NSMutableDictionary *queryDictionary = [NSMutableDictionary dictionaryWithCapacity:[queryItemStrings count]];
00077   for(NSString *queryItemString in queryItemStrings) {
00078     NSRange range = [queryItemString rangeOfString:@"="];
00079     if (range.location != NSNotFound) {
00080       NSString *key = [NSURL gh_decode:[queryItemString substringToIndex:range.location]];
00081       NSString *value = [NSURL gh_decode:[queryItemString substringFromIndex:range.location + 1]];
00082       [queryDictionary setObject:value forKey:key];
00083     }
00084   }
00085   return queryDictionary;
00086 }
00087 
00088 - (NSString *)gh_sortedQuery {
00089   return [NSURL gh_dictionaryToQueryString:[self gh_queryDictionary] sort:YES];
00090 }
00091 
00092 - (NSURL *)gh_deriveWithQuery:(NSString *)query {
00093   NSMutableString *urlString = [NSMutableString stringWithFormat:@"%@://", [self scheme]];
00094   if ([self user] && [self password]) [urlString appendFormat:@"%@:%@@", [self user], [self password]];
00095   [urlString appendString:[self host]];
00096   if ([self port]) [urlString appendFormat:@":%d", [[self port] integerValue]];
00097   [urlString appendString:[self path]];
00098   if (query) [urlString appendFormat:@"?%@", query];
00099   if ([self fragment]) [urlString appendFormat:@"#%@", [self fragment]];  
00100   return [NSURL URLWithString:urlString];
00101 }
00102 
00103 - (NSURL *)gh_canonical {
00104   return [self gh_canonicalWithIgnore:nil];
00105 }
00106 
00107 - (NSURL *)gh_canonicalWithIgnore:(NSArray *)ignore {
00108   NSString *query = nil;
00109   if ([self query]) {
00110     NSMutableDictionary *queryParams = [self gh_queryDictionary];
00111     for(NSString *key in ignore) [queryParams removeObjectForKey:key];
00112     query = [NSURL gh_dictionaryToQueryString:queryParams sort:YES];
00113   }
00114   
00115   return [self gh_deriveWithQuery:query];
00116 }
00117 
00118 + (NSString *)gh_encode:(NSString *)s { 
00119   // Characters to maybe leave unescaped? CFSTR("~!@#$&*()=:/,;?+'")
00120   return [(NSString *)CFURLCreateStringByAddingPercentEscapes(NULL, (CFStringRef)s, CFSTR("#"), CFSTR("%^{}[]\"\\"), kCFStringEncodingUTF8) autorelease];
00121 }
00122 
00123 + (NSString *)gh_encodeComponent:(NSString *)s {  
00124   // Characters to maybe leave unescaped? CFSTR("~!*()'")
00125   return [(NSString *)CFURLCreateStringByAddingPercentEscapes(NULL, (CFStringRef)s, NULL, CFSTR("@#$%^&{}[]=:/,;?+\"\\"), kCFStringEncodingUTF8) autorelease];
00126 }
00127 
00128 + (NSString *)gh_escapeAll:(NSString *)s {
00129   // Characters to escape: @#$%^&{}[]=:/,;?+"\~!*()'
00130   return [(NSString *)CFURLCreateStringByAddingPercentEscapes(NULL, (CFStringRef)s, NULL, CFSTR("@#$%^&{}[]=:/,;?+\"\\~!*()'"), kCFStringEncodingUTF8) autorelease];  
00131 }
00132 
00133 + (NSString *)gh_decode:(NSString *)s {
00134   if (!s) return nil;
00135   return [(NSString *)CFURLCreateStringByReplacingPercentEscapes(NULL, (CFStringRef)s, CFSTR("")) autorelease];
00136 }

00138 #ifndef TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00139 
00140 - (void)gh_copyLinkToPasteboard {  
00141   NSPasteboard *pasteboard = [NSPasteboard generalPasteboard];
00142   [pasteboard declareTypes:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:NSURLPboardType, NSStringPboardType, nil] owner:self];
00143   [self writeToPasteboard:pasteboard]; // For NSURLPBoardType
00144   [pasteboard setString:[self absoluteString] forType:NSStringPboardType];
00145 }
00146 
00147 + (BOOL)gh_openFile:(NSString *)path {
00148   NSString *fileURL = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"file://%@", [self gh_encode:path]];
00149   NSURL *url = [NSURL URLWithString:fileURL];
00150   return [[NSWorkspace sharedWorkspace] openURL:url];
00151 }
00152 
00153 + (void)gh_openContainingFolder:(NSString *)path {
00154   BOOL isDir;
00155   if ([[NSFileManager defaultManager] fileExistsAtPath:path isDirectory:&isDir] && isDir)
00156     [self gh_openFile:path];
00157   else
00158     [self gh_openFile:[path stringByDeletingLastPathComponent]];
00159 }
